inclusion.criterion: Previously untreated patients with symptomatic MM
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Suitable for high dose therapy and ASCT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease as defined by one of the following:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Secretory myeloma: Monoclonal protein in the serum (≥10 g/L) or monoclonal light chain in the urine (Bence Jones protein ≥200mg/24hours), or serum free light chain (SFLC, involved light chain ≥100mg/L provided the FLC ratio is abnormal)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Non-secretory myeloma: Either ≥30% clonal plasma cells in bone marrow (aspirate or trephine) Or 10-30% clonal plasma cells in the marrow and >1 soft tissue or extra-osseous plasmacytoma ≥ 2 cm that is measurable for response assessment by CT or MRI
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hepatic function, with serum ALT ≤ 3.5 times the upper limit of normal and serum direct bilirubin ≤ 2 mg/dL (34 µmol/L) within 14 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) ≥ 1.0 × 10^9/L within 14 days prior to registration and subject has not received any growth factor support within 7 days of testing.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ANC≥0.8x10^9/L allowed for patients with racial neutropenia.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Haemoglobin ≥ 8 g/dL (80 g/L) within 14 days prior to registration (subjects may be receiving red blood cell (RBC) transfusions in accordance with institutional guidelines)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Platelet count ≥ 75 × 10^9/L (≥ 50 × 10^9/L if myeloma involvement in the bone marrow is > 50%) within 14 days prior to registration and subject has not received any platelet transfusions within 7 days prior to testing.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine clearance (CrCl) ≥ 30 mL/minute within 14 days prior to registration, either measured or calculated using a standard formula (e.g. Cockcroft and Gault).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous systemic chemotherapy for myeloma, with the exception of steroids
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and represents with malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching.
